title: Lair of the Fox
description: The film crew sailing on the limpid Sea of Marmara have never heard of the Little Fox. Nor the fanatical Kurdish freedom fighters whose bizarre hijack galvanised the world. US diplomat Paul Cyrus conducts the knife-egde negotiations. But the film's leading lady -radical, famous and beautiful Amanda Morgan - makes an offer the Little Fox cannot refuse. Herself for the hostages. A deal he accepts with alacrity. And thin air.Suddenly, inexplicably, the Russians offer support. But Feliks Ilyinsky and his crack Spetsnaz commandos have another, desperate purpose. Twelve canisters of the deadliest nerve gas invented have gone missing....
author: Daniel Pollock
